Classes/AnimatedImageView.html#/s:vC7Ima.name: autoPlayAnimatedImage
Classes/AnimatedImageView.html#/s:vC7Ima.abstract: Whether automatically play the animation when the view become visible. Default is true.

Classes/AnimatedImageView.html#/s:vC7Ima.name: needsPrescaling
Classes/AnimatedImageView.html#/s:vC7Ima.abstract: Specifies whether the GIF frames should be pre-scaled to save memory. Default is true.

Classes/AnimatedImageView.html#/s:vC7Ima.name: runLoopMode
Classes/AnimatedImageView.html#/s:vC7Ima.abstract: The animation timer’s run loop mode. Default is NSRunLoopCommonModes. Set this property to NSDefaultRunLoopMode will make the animation pause during UIScrollView scrolling.

Classes/AnimatedImageView.html.name: AnimatedImageView
Classes/AnimatedImageView.html.abstract: AnimatedImageView is a subclass of UIImageView for displaying animated image.

Classes/ImageryCache.html.name: ImageryCache
Classes/ImageryCache.html.abstract: ImageryCache represents both the memory and disk cache system of Imagery.

Classes/ImageDownloader.html.name: ImageDownloader
Classes/ImageDownloader.html.abstract: ImageDownloader represents a downloading manager for requesting the image with a URL from server.

Classes/ImageryRetrieveImageTask.html.name: ImageryRetrieveImageTask
Classes/ImageryRetrieveImageTask.html.abstract: ImageryRetrieveImageTask represents a task of image retrieving process.

Classes/ImageryManager.html.name: ImageryManager
Classes/ImageryManager.html.abstract: Main manager class of Imagery. It connects Imagery downloader and cache.

Classes/ImagePrefetcher.html.name: ImagePrefetcher
Classes/ImagePrefetcher.html.abstract: ImagePrefetcher represents a downloading manager for requesting many images via URLs, then caching them.
